title: Ketu Transit in the 9th House: Redefining Faith and Wisdom
summary: When Ketu transits the 9th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, belief systems, faith, and guidance undergo detachment and reevaluation. You may feel disconnected from traditional doctrines, mentors, or inherited philosophies, seeking truth through personal experience instead. Long-distance travel, higher learning, or legal matters require patience and clarity. This transit favors inner wisdom over blind belief, teaching that true dharma emerges from lived understanding, humility, and disciplined inquiry rather than rigid ideology.

sections.title: Travel & Learning
points: Delays or changes in long journeys

closing: Ketu in the 9th house refines faith by dissolving borrowed beliefs and revealing wisdom earned through experience.
